full_text: @ShayMike14 Hi there. Thanks for reaching out. We are always pleased to hear from our consumers and appreciate you for sharing your feedback with us. We'll be sure to pass them on to our teams!

@Fadeddeath Hi there, the FDA requires nutrition values for unpopped popcorn to be on the label. The 140 calories is unpopped. If you want to find for popped - 2.5(servings per bag) X 4.5(cups popped) X 25(calories per one cup popped) = 281.25 calories for a popped bag of popcorn.
